message.entry: The number of unique labels in input ImageDatastore object, imds, must match the number of image categories used to train the imageCategoryClassifier.
You need at least two image categories. That means that the number of unique labels in input ImageDatastore object, imds, must be at least two.
Each element of the Labels cell array must be a character vector.
The number of character vectors in the Labels cell array must equal NumCategories.
When the input is an image, ''UseParallel'' is ignored.
LearnerOptions must be a valid SVM template created using templateSVM function.
LearnerOptions must be a valid SVM template with the Type argument of the templateSVM function set to ''classification''.
Expected imds.Labels to have labels defined for every image in the input ImageDatastore.
